text: Koni, Yuda mangan Yowasa yi se sariɲanxine birin tongo, a benbane bata yi naxanye rasariɲan, Yosafati nun Yehorami nun Axasiya, Yuda mangane, e nun a tan yɛtɛɛn bata yi naxanye rasariɲan. A mɔn yi xɛmaan tongo naxan birin yi Alatala Batu Banxini nafulu ramaraden nun manga banxin nafulu ramaradeni. A yi na birin xali Arami mangan Xasayele yɛɛ ra naxan mi siga Yerusalɛn yɛngɛdeni.
